description:
The Ginyu Force has been dispatched to Planet Namek to help search for the Dragon Balls. Unaware of this new threat, Krillin and Gohan struggle to keep the seventh Dragon Ball from falling into Vegeta’s evil hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freezer no Himitsu Heiki! Akuma no Ginyuu Toku Sentai
O Grupo Secreto de Freeza! As Terríveis Forças Especiais Ginyu
อาวุธลับของฟรีสเซอร์! กองกำลังสุดโฉดกีนิว
フリーザの秘密兵器! 悪魔のギニュー特戦隊
